ARABIC: وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ لَا يُخْلِفُ ٱللَّهُ وَعْدَهُۥ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is Allah's promise. Allah does not break His promise. But most people do not know it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is a promise of God; and God does not go back on His promise. Yet most men do not understand:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This is Allah's promise and He does not go back on His promise. But most people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is the promise of God. God does not ignore His promise, but many people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The promise of Allah; Allah does not renege on His promise, but most people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: A promise from Allah, and Allah fails not in His promise, but most men know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (This is) Allah's promise! Allah will not fail His promise, but most people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The promise of God! God fails not His promise, but most men do not know it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It is a promise of Allah. Allah faileth not His promise, but most of mankind know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [This is] God's promise. Never does God fail to fulfil His promise -- but most people do not know this;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This is Allah's promise; and Allah faileth not His promise. Yet most men know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [This is] a promise of Allah: Allah does not break His promise, but most people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (It is) the promise of Allah. Never does Allah depart from His promise: but most men understand not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (It is) a Promise of Allah (i.e. Allah will give victory to the Romans against the Persians), and Allah fails not in His Promise, but most of men know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The promise of Allah! Allah does not fail His promise, yet most people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The promise of God—God never breaks His promise, but most people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [It is] the promise of Allah. Allah does not fail in His promise, but most of the people do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [30:6] The promise of God (wa‘da’Llāhi is the verbal noun substituting for the [full] verbal construction; it is actually wa‘adahumu’Llāhu al-nasr, ‘God promised them victory’). God does not fail His promise, of such [help], but most people, namely, the disbelievers of Mecca, are not aware, of His promise to help them [to victory].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (It is a promise of Allah) that victory and the upper hand will be for Muhammad (pbuh). (Allah faileth not His promise) to His prophet that victory and the upper hand will be his, (but most of mankind) the people of Mecca (know not) that Allah will not fail His promise to His Prophet.
